q1: Argentina is my second favorite team!
a1: They are in most people's top few favorites!
q2: Argentina are loved because of Messi.
a2: No because they have a great team.
q3: How long do you think Messi will stay in Argentina?
a3: I think Messi will play his career in Argentina.
q4: Do you think Argentina would be any good without Messi?
a4: I don't see how they could be worse.
q5: What development should they do for younger players?
